result.title: Welcome
result.content: Welcome to Amrita's Codeforces Community. If there's anyone we've missed or if you're from Amrita University, India and would like to join this ping me or one of the admins and we'll do the needful. If you're hosting contests create a corresponding blog posts so everyone is notified. If you want a new contest or similar put a request in the comments below. All suggestions are welcome. Happy Coding. ash1794
